summary: Feature 8 (Outstanding Balance Warning with Partial Payment Tracking) testing complete. Backend: 15/15 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 6 features verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/tenants/{id}/outstanding endpoint returns correct structure
Backend: has_outstanding=True when tenant has unpaid months
Backend: has_outstanding=True when tenant has partially paid months (warning stays until FULLY paid)
Backend: has_outstanding=False when month is fully paid
Backend: outstanding_amount correctly includes partial payment remainders
Backend: partial_payments list exists and contains partial payment entries
Backend: Each partial payment has amount_paid and remaining fields
Backend: Each partial payment has label (e.g., 'Januari 2026')
Backend: Outstanding month has status='partial' for partially paid months
Backend: Outstanding month has status='unpaid' for unpaid months
Backend: Outstanding month has remaining amount for display
Backend: unpaid_count field exists in response
Backend: partial_count field exists in response
Backend: Counts are calculated separately (unpaid_count + partial_count = total)
Backend: Scenario test - 1500 rent, 500 partial payment = 1000 outstanding
Frontend: 'Openstaand saldo' warning title visible
Frontend: 'Totaal openstaand: SRD 1.000,00' displayed correctly
Frontend: '1 gedeeltelijk' count badge visible
Frontend: 'Gedeeltelijk betaald:' section with blue background visible
Frontend: Partial payment details show 'SRD 500,00 betaald • SRD 1.000,00 nog open'
Frontend: 'Januari 2026 ⚡' badge with lightning symbol visible
Frontend: '⚡ = gedeeltelijk betaald' legend visible
Frontend: Month selector shows 'Januari ⚡ (nog SRD 1.000,00)'

feature_1_warning_stays_until_fully_paid.description: Warning (has_outstanding=True) stays visible until balance is FULLY paid, not just partially paid

feature_2_total_outstanding_includes_par.description: Total outstanding amount correctly includes partial payment remainders (1500-500=1000)

feature_3_partial_payments_section.description: Partial payments section shows each month with amount_paid and remaining (e.g., 'Januari 2026: 500 betaald, 1000 nog open')

feature_4_month_selector_lightning_symbo.description: Month selector shows ⚡ symbol with remaining amount for partially paid months (e.g., 'Januari ⚡ (nog 1000)')

feature_5_different_styling_partial_vs_u.description: Outstanding months list shows different styling - blue border for partial, orange for unpaid

feature_6_summary_counts_separate.description: Summary counts show unpaid_count and partial_count separately

seed_data_creation: Test data created with prefix 'TEST_UI_Outstanding_' during UI testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Feature 8 (Outstanding Balance Warning with Partial Payment Tracking) has been fully tested and verified. The GET /api/tenants/{tenant_id}/outstanding endpoint correctly returns: has_outstanding (true until FULLY paid), outstanding_amount (includes partial remainders), outstanding_months (with status 'unpaid' or 'partial'), partial_payments (list of partially paid months with amount_paid and remaining), unpaid_count, partial_count. The frontend Payments page displays: orange warning box with total outstanding, blue partial payments section with details, month badges with ⚡ for partial, month selector with ⚡ and remaining amount.

scenario_tested.description: 1500 SRD rent, 500 SRD partial payment for January 2026
